verbs.description: [V: Basking] [ARGM-MNR: in the afterglow of his apparently constructive meeting with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] said that he 'd soon like a " real deal " with the U.S. ' other long - time enemy Iran .
